#summary GEToolStrip control notes
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The GEToolStrip control intergrates with the GEWebBrowser to provide controls for the basic options in the Google Earth Plugin. 


= Details =

The GEToolStrip inherits from the standard [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.forms.toolstrip.aspx System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip] control class

== Constructor == 

_GEToolStrip_ *GEToolStrip()*<br>
Initializes a new instance of the GEToolStrip class

== Public Properties ==

_Bool_ *ShowNavigationItems*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation items are visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowLayersDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Layers drop down is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowOptionsDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Options drop down is visible <br>

_Bool_ *ShowViewDropDown*<br>
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the View drop down is visible <br>

== Public methods ==

_void_ *SetBrowserInstance(FC.GEPluginCtrls.GEWebBrowser)*<br>
Set the browser instance for the control to work with
